attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: First of all it took like 2 days to download and there were some problems after that. It started glitching and taking my phone from like a 70% to a 30%. Honestly I think this app will not be able to be fixed there for you should just remove  it!

attributes.title: Cursed
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app Sans burst through my door and beat me up, he was wearing a Trump 2020 hat and I’m convinced that he wanted to steal my phone and give this app a five star review, luckily I smacked his head with a chair and escaped before he caught me. I am currently on the run and wanted to share this info with everyone to stay away

attributes.title: STAY SAFE! THIS PRESIDENT IS DANGEROUS
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to see what this Trump guy was all about. Turns out he’s a racist! Said the n word multiple times, in addition to r*ping under age girls. Plus this app is basically full of lies. Total propaganda. Not gonna lie, I did think this was a dating app at first but was sad to realize it wasn’t. 0/10 this man and app are not good for America.

attributes.title: RUSSIAN SPIES
attributes.review: I just wanted to know what the latest updates were on our amazing President Trump 🇺🇸🇺🇸.But when I open the app, I found that it was extremely cluttered and I couldn’t find any information. Then, it started demanding I enable location services so it could spy on me! Do not download this app, it’s made by Hillary’s Russian spies!

attributes.title: Just no....
attributes.review: I had a lot of problems with the app, it operated poorly and kept crashing. I thought it may have been my phone, but even after getting a new phone this app kept causing problems and I just gave up in the end! Don’t get this app it is so bad!!

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app needs to be removed from the App Store. Most useless thing out there. Constantly makes my phone crash and some other weird things have been happening since I got it. Pretty sure this is just another way for trump to watch what we’re doing. DONT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.title: Ban it
attributes.review: This app. Makes my phone crash. I have had to restart my phone and accidentally lost a lot of my stuff on my phone. Makes my phones battery drain so fast. The app crashes as soon as I open it. Just delete it and never make it available on any App Store.

attributes.title: a horrible app 🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: this app is horrible, after two days of having ur in my phone it made my phone crash. That’s not the only thing that happened but when I went into the app there were soooooooooo many glitches. Just fix the app and be educated🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: The service was terrible, I waited for my food to arrive and it never did, the line for the bouncy house was extremely long and they didn’t even have air conditioning, yet they want me to “come again later” I ensure you my family and I will not be returning.

attributes.title: No ❤️ 🤩
attributes.review:
When I downloaded this I expect to finally see what it feels like to be a cis, rich, privileged, sexist, racist, ignorant, controlling, inconsiderate, narcissistic white(sometimes orange✨🙈)male with a toxic masculinity but was very sad to see that it took up to much room on my phone making me not be able to download it 🤧. Oh well... 

            💫Anyways settle for Biden🥰
